about_the_game:
Signal: Uncharted Lands is a visual novel set in an unusual post-apocalyptic world. Members of a new civilization set out to uncover a mysterious signal. Where does this signal come from? What dangers await the explorers on their journey through uncharted wastelands? Will they reach their goal, or will something stand in their way? Find answers to these and other questions in this novel!

In this game you'll be:

🐾 Traveling with a group of quirky explorers, facing dangers, making new friends, and discovering interesting things;

🐾 Learning more about the previous civilization of this world;

🐾 Making decisions that will affect the course of the game and its ending;

🐾 Solving puzzles and participating in quizze;

🐾 Laughing at all the references and Easter eggs.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a journey with four adorable explorers! Uncover all the secrets of a post-apocalyptic world, meet the future inhabitants of Earth and enjoy plenty of Easter eggs. Your choices will shape the game's ending, so choose wisely! Or try a second playthrough to catch all the fun moments!
